name: Mercure Hotel Kassel

reviews.title: Great experience and we will definitely have the same next time!

reviews.text: I stayed at this hotel with my wife and two children aged 1 and 4. I had booked the hotel through the hotel groups homepage where I had indicated that I would arrive with the two children.
reviews.title: Great location

description: Welcome to the art metropolis. Experience a hotel with a very special ambience. A relaxing domicile for business travellers and private persons who want to enjoy the city of 'documenta' and its many-facetted wealth of art and culture.
